sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vBasePage
    :searchOptions="searchOptions"
    :tableOption="tableOption"
    @rowBlock="rowClick"
  ></vBasePage>
</template>

<script>
import vBasePage from "../../BasePage/BasePage";
import FileManagerApi from "../webapi/FileManager";
import moment from "moment";
import config from "@/config/index";
import { FileType, FileData} from '../js/FileType';

export default {
  data() {
    var _ = this;
    return {
      searchOptions: {
        searchOptions: {
          requiredCondition: false
        },
        seleFunc: {
          export: true,
          search: true
        },
        exportUrl: FileManagerApi.GetFileDownloadList,
        search_controls: [
          {
            type: "v_text",
            title: "文件名",
            key: "FileName"
          },
          { 
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "文件类型",
            key: "FileType",
            data: FileData,
            selectkey: "TypeId",
            selectvalue: "TypeName"
          },
          {
            type: "v_datetime",
            title: "下载开始日期",
            key: "UpdateTimeStartDate"
            //defdate: moment(new Date()).add(-1, 'months').format("YYYY-MM-DD")
          },
          {
            type: "v_datetime",
            title: "下载结束日期",
            key: "UpdateTimeEndDate"
          }
        ]
      },
      tableOption: {
        tableId: "fileupload",
        tableName: "文件下载记录",
        url: config.pgyerApiUrl + FileManagerApi.GetFileDownloadList.options.url,
        method: FileManagerApi.GetFileDownloadList.options.method,
        columns: [
          {
            field: "fileName",
            title: "文件名",
            align: "center",
          },
          {
            field: "fileType",
            title: "文件类型",
            align: "center",
            formatter: function(val, row) {
              return FileType[row.fileType];
            }
          },
          {
            field: "updateTime",
            title: "下载时间",
            align: "center",
            formatter: function(val, row) {
              return moment(val).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm");
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    rowClick: function(rowItem, element, baseObject) {
      console.log(element);
      debugger;
    }
  },
  components: { vBasePage }
};
</script>
